description:
Emperor Gross` prison, from which no one can escape, is in the Blue City of Persia. Kakeru thinks that his father might be there, and goes to the entrance of the city...
Source: tezukaosamu.net

titles.title: Ai no Hikouki! Prussian Blue no Sora o Tobe!!
Aventure dans le ciel de la ville bleu de Prusse
The Plane of Love! Fly in the Persian Blue!!
愛の飛行機! プルシャンブルーの空を飛べ!!
